Risk_Description: Backend API not ready when needed
Mitigation_Strategy: Create mock APIs in parallel. Define contracts early. Daily sync with backend team.
Test on 10+ device types from Sprint 2. Use Firebase Test Lab. Standardize on common components.
Fallback to manual document upload. DigiLocker is nice-to-have not critical.
Tech Lead owns MQTT. Use proven library (Paho). Have REST polling as fallback.
Follow Apple guidelines strictly. Pre-review with Apple. Have buffer time for fixes.
Cross-train team members. Document everything. No single points of failure.
Strict change control process. All changes via PM. Defer non-critical to v2.
Profile performance from Sprint 2. Set min API level 24. Lazy loading.

Risk_Description: Offline sync conflicts cause data loss
Mitigation_Strategy: Server-wins policy. Comprehensive conflict resolution. Extensive testing.
App must work 100% offline for core features. Store-and-forward architecture.
